actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for the status of the Northern Rocky Mountain distinct population segment of the gray wolf, and for other purposes.
short_title: Delisting Gray Wolves to Restore State Management Act of 2011

summary.text: Delisting Gray Wolves to Restore State Management Act of 2011 - Grants the full force and effect of law to the final rule entitled "Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Final Rule To Identify the Northern Rocky Mountain Population of Gray Wolf as a Distinct Population Segment and To Revise the List of Endangered and Threatened Wildlife."

titles.title: Delisting Gray Wolves to Restore State Management Act of 2011
A bill to provide for the status of the Northern Rocky Mountain distinct population segment of the gray wolf, and for other purposes.
